name: Game Of Legends
description:
The year is 1940 and the name of the game is action. 

Play as either 2 characters and utilize your troops in a WW2 energy game to protect your homeland. Use a unique merge button to bring your troops into a strategic location and venture into enemy territory by yourself or with your team mate to battle paratroopers, dog handlers and the secret police. Play as a elite soldier who lost his family in a horrific AXIS execution, or a man that can who just came out of nowhere.

Can you take down the game?
